Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Relates to community preservation funds for the town of Chester
Summary: Authorizes the town of Chester to establish community preservation funds; establishes a real estate transfer tax with revenues therefrom to be deposited in said community preservation fund.
LawCode: Add §64-l, Town L; add Art 31-A-4 §§1439-aaa - 1439-ppp, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to authorizing the town of Chester, county of Orange to establish community preservation funds; to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the town of Chester to impose a real estate transfer tax with revenues therefrom to be deposited in said community preservation fund; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
